items: Stand with your feet hip-width apart and your arms at your sides.
Lift your right foot off the ground and bend your knee, bringing your heel towards your buttocks.
Grab your ankle with your right hand and hold it in place.
Slowly lower your foot back down to the ground, keeping your knee bent.
Repeat the movement with your left leg.
Continue alternating legs for the desired number of repetitions.
Increases flexibility in hip flexors and quads
Can be done anywhere without equipment
Helps prevent injuries by strengthening muscles used in running and jumping
